string.name: dev/select
string.value: Cannot execute anything when nothing is selected.

string.name: dev/select/solution
string.value: Select a feature and a method to run.

string.name: dev/feature
string.value: Non existing feature used or feature script is not loaded.

string.name: dev/feature/solution
string.value: Use a feature that exists and make sure the scripts are loaded.

string.name: dev/function
string.value: No function to execute for feature '%%' and method '%%'.

string.name: dev/function/solution
string.value: Make sure the selection has a function to execute.

string.name: dev/input/solution
string.value: Make sure the input field exists to enter user inputs.

string.name: dev/form/solution
string.value: Make sure the mode select element exists.

string.name: dev/mode/solution
string.value: Make sure the target select element exists.

string.name: dev/same
string.value: Source and target units are same.

string.name: dev/same/solution
string.value: Pick a different value to make a conversion.

string.name: dev/execute
string.value: Execution failed for feature '%%' and method '%%' : %%.

string.name: dev/execute/solution
string.value: Check the script for the method.
